channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- RESTEasy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- RESTEasy

item.title: CVE-2023-0482|2023-04-27T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- resteasy
item.description: In RESTEasy the insecure File.createTempFile() is used in the DataSourceProvider, FileProvider and Mime4JWorkaround classes which creates temp files with insecure permissions that could be read by a local user.
